comments:
XMLHelperImpl.setManyReference() method currently throws the following exceptions for some specific cases of loading models. 

In general, this code assumes that items for bidirectional features would definitely be in the list, but in "defer ID resolution" mode, this assumption is wrong and the fix is to check for the object being in the list and to add it if it's not there.

Unfortunately, it is hard to localize this problem and i can not attach concrete model file to this request for safety of customer i.p.

exceptions:
